Body:
carry_in = bw.wire.Wire()
input_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
carry_out = bw.wire.Wire()
sum_ = bw.wire.Wire()
a = bw.arithmetic.FullAdder(carry_in, input_1, input_2, carry_out, sum_)
carry_in.value = 0
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (0, 0)
carry_in.value = 0
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (0, 1)
carry_in.value = 0
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (0, 1)
carry_in.value = 0
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (1, 0)
carry_in.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (0, 1)
carry_in.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (1, 0)
carry_in.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (1, 0)
carry_in.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (1, 1)
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(carry_in=0, a=0, b=0, carry_out=None, sum=None)
print(a)
assert (carry_out.value, sum_.value) == (0, 0)
